summary.span: 包含已计算的规则的名称、实例 ID 和条件结果。

span.span: Contains the name, instance ID, and condition result of a rule that has been evaluated.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example shows how to use the class. 此代码示例摘自 ConsoleTrackingService.cs 文件中的“RuleActionTrackingEventSample”SDK 示例。This code example is part of the RuleActionTrackingEventSample SDK Sample from the ConsoleTrackingService.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[RuleActionTrackingEvent 示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cea1192f-82e2-4c8a-acc0-5f8ed462de73)。For more information, see [RuleActionTrackingEvent Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cea1192f-82e2-4c8a-acc0-5f8ed462de73).
